verses.verse: A Prayer <WH8605> of David <WH1732>. Bow down <WH5186> <WH8685> thine ear <WH241>, O YY <WH3068>, hear <WH6030> <WH8798> me: for I am poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>.
Preserve <WH8104> <WH8798> my soul <WH5315>; for I am holy <WH2623>: O thou my 'Elohim <WH430>, save <WH3467> <WH8685> thy servant <WH5650> that trusteth <WH982> <WH8802> in thee.
Be merciful <WH2603> <WH8798> unto me, O YY <WH136>: for I cry <WH7121> <WH8799> unto thee daily <WH3117>.
Rejoice <WH8055> <WH8761> the soul <WH5315> of thy servant <WH5650>: for unto thee, O YY <WH136>, do I lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> my soul <WH5315>.
For thou, YY <WH136>, art good <WH2896>, and ready to forgive <WH5546>; and plenteous <WH7227> in mercy <WH2617> unto all them that call <WH7121> <WH8802> upon thee.
Give ear <WH238> <WH8685>, O YY <WH3068>, unto my prayer <WH8605>; and attend <WH7181> <WH8685> to the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469>.
In the day <WH3117> of my trouble <WH6869> I will call <WH7121> <WH8799> upon thee: for thou wilt answer <WH6030> <WH8799> me.
Among the 'elohim <WH430> there is none like unto thee, O YY <WH136>; neither are there any works like unto thy works <WH4639>.

All nations <WH1471> whom thou hast made <WH6213> <WH8804> shall come <WH935> <WH8799> and worship <WH7812> <WH8691> before <WH6440> thee, O YY <WH136>; and shall glorify <WH3513> <WH8762> thy name <WH8034>.
For thou art great <WH1419>, and doest <WH6213> <WH8802> wondrous things <WH6381> <WH8737>: thou art 'Elohim <WH430> alone.
Teach <WH3384> <WH8685> me thy way <WH1870>, O YY <WH3068>; I will walk <WH1980> <WH8762> in thy truth <WH571>: unite <WH3161> <WH8761> my heart <WH3824> to fear <WH3372> <WH8800> thy name <WH8034>.
I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, O YY <WH136> my 'Elohim <WH430>, with all my heart <WH3824>: and I will glorify <WH3513> <WH8762> thy name <WH8034> for evermore <WH5769>.
For great <WH1419> is thy mercy <WH2617> toward me: and thou hast delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> my soul <WH5315> from the lowest <WH8482> SH'ol <WH7585>.

O 'Elohim <WH430>, the proud <WH2086> are risen <WH6965> <WH8804> against me, and the assemblies <WH5712> of violent <WH6184> men have sought <WH1245> <WH8765> after my soul <WH5315>; and have not set <WH7760> <WH8804> thee before them.
But thou, O YY <WH136>, art a 'Elohim <WH410> full of compassion <WH7349>, and gracious <WH2587>, longsuffering <WH750> <WH639>, and plenteous <WH7227> in mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571>.

O turn <WH6437> <WH8798> unto me, and have mercy <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me; give <WH5414> <WH8798> thy strength <WH5797> unto thy servant <WH5650>, and save <WH3467> <WH8685> the son <WH1121> of thine handmaid <WH519>.

Shew <WH6213> <WH8798> me a token <WH226> for good <WH2896>; that they which hate <WH8130> <WH8802> me may see <WH7200> <WH8799> it, and be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>: because thou, YY <WH3068>, hast holpen <WH5826> <WH8804> me, and comforted <WH5162> <WH8765> me.
